artifacts.artifact:
insert into @{openQuote}object@{closeQuote} (id, type, formId, name, title, description, tooltip, action, actionTarget, objectId, sequence) select 3, 'MENU_ITEM', 1, '@{menuItemName}', '#{ui}', '', '', '@{menuItemUrl}', '', 1, 2 where not exists (select 1 from @{openQuote}object@{closeQuote} where id = 3);
insert into @{openQuote}groupObject@{closeQuote} (objectId, groupId) select 3, 1 where not exists (select 1 from @{openQuote}groupObject@{closeQuote} where objectId = 3 and groupId = 1);
